data.title: NVIDIA's Earnings Performance Since ChatGPT's Release
data.description: NVIDIA $NVDA has achieved ten earnings triple plays out of 13 quarters since the release of ChatGPT in November 2022. Bespoke Investment Group posted on X. Despite this strong performance, the stock has experienced intraday declines on each of its last seven earnings reaction days.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | U.S. Citizen Killed in Incident Involving Cuban Vessel
data.description: A recent incident involving a Cuban vessel has resulted in the death of at least one U.S. citizen. According to Jin10, the event has drawn attention due to the involvement of American nationals on board. The circumstances surrounding the incident remain under investigation, highlighting ongoing geopolitical tensions in the region. Further details are awaited as authorities continue to assess the situation.

data.title: “Crypto Will Fail Without Privacy”: Analyst Warns of Broken Premise
data.description:
Crypto promised financial freedom, but today’s transparent chains are turning it into a fully-surveilled financial system, claims analyst.
source: https://dailycoin.com/crypto-will-fail-without-privacy-analyst-warns-of-broken-premise/?utm_source=cryptopanic&utm_medium=rss

data.title: Bitcoin ETF Inflows Hit $506M as Institutional Buying Resumes
data.description:
Bitcoin ETFs saw $506M in inflows as institutional buying resumed, led by large BTC accumulation from major issuers.

The post Bitcoin ETF Inflows Hit $506M as Institutional Buying Resumes first appeared on Crypto News And Market Updates | BTCUSA.

source: https://btcusa.com/bitcoin-etf-inflows-hit-506m-as-institutional-buying-resumes/

data.title: World Markets Debuts All‑in‑One DEX
data.description:
World Markets launches a unified DEX on MegaETH, combining spot, perpetuals, and lending with cross-margin accounts and portfolio-level risk management.
source: https://catenaa.com/markets/cryptocurrencies/world-markets-debuts-all-in-one-dex/

data.title: Ethereum holds above $2K – Will volatility spark ETH’s breakout?
data.description:
Ethereum signals breakout potential as institutional absorption meets rising volatility.
source: https://ambcrypto.com/ethereum-holds-above-2k-will-volatility-spark-eths-breakout/

data.title: Bloomberg extends financial data to $25B tokenized markets via Kaiko
data.description:
Bloomberg and Kaiko aim to embed licensed financial data directly on blockchain networks, targeting institutional tokenized Treasurys and repo markets.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/bloomberg-extends-financial-data-to-25b-tokenized-markets-via-kaiko?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: MicroStrategy's Stock Decline Continues Amid $40 Million Bitcoin Purchase
data.description: MicroStrategy's stock price is experiencing a continued decline despite the company's recent acquisition of $40 million worth of Bitcoin, increasing its total holdings to over 717,000 BTC. According to NS3.AI, the stock is exhibiting signs of weakening momentum and indecision among institutional investors. This is evidenced by a flat Chaikin Money Flow and bearish RSI divergences. Technical analysis suggests that if the current bearish trend continues, the stock may face further downside, with critical support anticipated near $70.

data.title: Oil Tanker Market Dominated by Single Shipowner
data.description: A shipowner's strategic investment in oil tankers has resulted in significant control over the supertanker market, particularly those capable of transporting American oil in the upcoming month. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting the shipowner's influence in the industry, which is seen as a rare occurrence. This dominance in the market underscores the shipowner's foresight and strategic planning, positioning them as a key player in global oil transportation. The impact of this control is expected to influence oil shipping dynamics and pricing in the near future.

data.title: Federal Reserve's Goolsbee Comments on Stable Job Market and Economy
data.description: The Federal Reserve's Goolsbee has stated that the job market remains stable and the economy is in a robust condition. According to ChainCatcher, these remarks highlight the ongoing strength of the economic landscape. The stability in employment figures is seen as a positive indicator of economic health, reflecting consistent growth and resilience.

data.title: Prediction Markets: A Tool for Truth and Profit
data.description: Prediction markets are increasingly being recognized as effective tools for discerning truth and generating profit. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting how these markets allow individuals to focus on specific facts and potentially earn money by accurately predicting outcomes. By leveraging collective intelligence, prediction markets can provide insights into various events, offering a unique blend of financial opportunity and factual verification.

data.title: SEC Announces Changes to Securities Information Processors
data.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has announced updates regarding the operations of exclusive securities information processors (SIPs). The SEC posted on X that these changes will enhance the ability of SIPs to collect, consolidate, process, and disseminate quotation and transaction information during the overnight session. This development aims to improve the efficiency and transparency of securities information processing, ensuring that market participants have access to timely and accurate data. The SEC's initiative is part of a broader effort to modernize the infrastructure supporting the U.S. securities markets.

data.title: SEC Reviews 24X's Request for Overnight Trading Exemption
data.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) posted on X about a notice regarding 24X's request for an exemption to allow trading during its overnight session. The proposed trading hours are from Sunday to Thursday, 9 p.m. to 4 a.m. ET. The SEC is currently reviewing the request, which aims to extend trading opportunities beyond regular market hours. This move could potentially impact trading dynamics and accessibility for investors seeking to engage in transactions outside traditional trading periods. The decision on the exemption request is pending further evaluation by the SEC.

data.title: AI Technology Raises Concerns Over Crypto Privacy
data.description: A recent preprint research paper reveals that AI agents can potentially link cryptocurrency wallets to social media profiles by analyzing publicly available posts. According to NS3.AI, this technology employs advanced AI models to extract identity-relevant data and probabilistically connect usernames across different platforms, with a financial cost as low as $4 per attempt. This advancement poses significant privacy concerns for cryptocurrency users, as deanonymization tools become more accessible to a broader range of adversaries.

data.title: Japan's Ambassador to the UK Gains Attention with Unique PR Approach
data.description: Japan's ambassador to the United Kingdom is capturing public interest through an unconventional public relations strategy. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting how this approach serves as a valuable lesson for diplomats worldwide. The ambassador's methods have been noted for their effectiveness in engaging with the public and fostering positive relations.

data.title: CPPIB Executive Sam Dorri Appointed as Chief of Staff to CEO John Graham
data.description: Sam Dorri, the managing director of financing and balance sheet management at the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board (CPPIB), has been appointed to serve as chief of staff to CEO John Graham. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting this strategic move within the organization. Dorri's new role is expected to leverage his extensive experience in financial management to support the CEO in executing CPPIB's strategic initiatives. This appointment underscores CPPIB's commitment to strengthening its leadership team as it navigates the complexities of global investment management.

data.title: US Public Pension Unaffected by AI's Impact on Private Credit Market
data.description: The largest public pension fund in the United States remains unfazed by the potential disruptions in the private credit market caused by advancements in artificial intelligence. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting that the fund is maintaining its investment strategy despite concerns about AI's impact on software sectors. The pension fund's confidence stems from its diversified portfolio and long-term investment outlook, which it believes will mitigate any short-term market fluctuations. This approach underscores the fund's commitment to stability and resilience in the face of technological advancements that may affect specific industries.

data.title: Former Executive Admits to Financial Misconduct Before Company's Collapse
data.description: A former executive of First Brands has confessed to a judge about engaging in fraudulent activities that contributed to the downfall of the auto-parts supplier. Bloomberg posted on X that the executive admitted to falsifying financial statements, inflating invoices, and double-pledging collateral to secure billions in funding. These actions were part of a scheme that ultimately led to the company's collapse. The revelations highlight significant misconduct within the organization, raising questions about oversight and governance practices.

data.title: This Deal Pushes USDT Beyond Exchanges
data.description:
Tether has invested $200 million in Whop, assigning the company a $1. 6 billion valuation. The transaction forms part of Tether’s broader strategy to expand stablecoin utility beyond trading venues and into digital commerce platforms. Whop operates a global online marketplace that facilitates the sale of digital products, software access, memberships, and community subscriptions
source: https://techgaged.com/this-deal-pushes-usdt-beyond-exchanges/

data.title: Starknet Launches strkBTC for Private Bitcoin DeFi
data.description:
The Ethereum Layer 2 network Starknet has announced the launch of strkBTC, a new Bitcoin-based asset designed to bring confidential transactions and shielded balances into the DeFi ecosystem. The initiative is part of Starknet’s broader BTCFi strategy, aimed at attracting Bitcoin liquidity into scalable Layer 2 infrastructure while preserving user privacy.
source: https://www.ethnews.com/starknet-launches-strkbtc-for-private-bitcoin-defi/
